sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email">
    <sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <blind_copied/>
        <body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
</style>

</head><body><p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Hi &nbsp;Ashik Vinod,</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">&nbsp;A Choice has been requested to create and requires your review and approval. Below are the details.<br><br> Action : create<br>Table : u_appraisal<br>Field : u_skills<br>New Value : Test Skill 2&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Please review and approve the changes at your earliest convenience.</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><font face="helvetica"></font></span></p><table><tbody><tr><td style="background-color: #d4fad9;border: 1px solid #d4fad9;-webkit-border-radius: 5px;-moz-border-radius: 5px;display: inline-block;padding: 10px;"><a href="mailto:zyndertechtest@gmail.com?subject=Re%3A%20-%20approve&amp;body=%0A%0ARef:MSG0001046_4TgHyAkF8EvaI2BCoyzv" style="color: #000000;font-size: 19px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;text-decoration: none; border-radius: 3px;">Approve</a></td></tr></tbody></table> <p></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><font face="helvetica"></font></span></p><table><tbody><tr><td style="background-color: #fad4d4;border: 1px solid #fad4d4;-webkit-border-radius: 5px;-moz-border-radius: 5px;display: inline-block;padding: 10px;"><a href="mailto:zyndertechtest@gmail.com?subject=Re%3A%20-%20reject&amp;body=%0A%0ARef:MSG0001046_4TgHyAkF8EvaI2BCoyzv" style="color: #000000;font-size: 19px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;text-decoration: none; border-radius: 3px;">Reject</a></td></tr></tbody></table><p></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><a href="/sysapproval_approver.do?sys_id=1700b20b8389ee50a946f896feaad3eb&amp;sysparm_record_target=sysapproval_approver">click here to view approval record.</a></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Regards,</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Zynder Tech.</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

<br><br>

<a id="snc_notification_unsubscribe" href="mailto:zyndertechtest@gmail.com?subject=Unsubscribe from &quot;Choice Configuration Approval&quot;&amp;body=Sending this email with the predefined content in the subject and body will unsubscribe you from the notification &quot;Choice Configuration Approval&quot;%0D%0A%0D%0AUnsubscribe:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;8049e2dbc3cc621052237405e4013135&quot;,&quot;token&quot;:&quot;c797e62132&quot;}">Unsubscribe</a> | <a id="snc_notification_preference" href="https://dev268649.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=notification_preferences.do%3Fsysparm_notification=8049e2dbc3cc621052237405e4013135">Notification Preferences</a><div>&nbsp;</div><div style="display:inline">Ref:MSG0001046_4TgHyAkF8EvaI2BCoyzv</div></body></html></body>
        <body_text/>
        <checkpoint>0</checkpoint>
        <content_type>text/html</content_type>
        <copied/>
        <deleted>false</deleted>
        <direct>zyndersreerag@gmail.com</direct>
        <error_string/>
        <headers>X-ServiceNow-Source:Notification-8049e2dbc3cc621052237405e4013135
List-Unsubscribe:<mailto:zyndertechtest@gmail.com?body=Sending+this+email+with+the+predefined+content+in+the+subject+and+body+will+unsubscribe+you+from+the+notification.%0D%0A%0D%0AUnsubscribe%3A%7B%22id%22%3A%228049e2dbc3cc621052237405e4013135%22%2C%22token%22%3A%22c797e62132%22%7D
 &subject=Unsubscribe+from+%22Choice+Configuration+Approval%22>
X-ServiceNow-SysEmail-Version:2
</headers>
        <importance/>
        <instance>1700b20b8389ee50a946f896feaad3eb</instance>
        <mailbox display_value="Outbox">outbox</mailbox>
        <message_id/>
        <notification_type>SMTP</notification_type>
        <receive_type>new</receive_type>
        <recipients>zyndersreerag@gmail.com</recipients>
        <reply_to/>
        <state>ready</state>
        <status/>
        <subject>Choice Configuration has been Requested to create by Suchithra PS</subject>
        <sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2025-04-26 10:23:50</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>c510f20b8389ee50a946f896feaad388</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2025-04-26 10:23:50</sys_updated_on>
        <target_table>sysapproval_approver</target_table>

        <user/>

    </sys_email>
</record_update>
